publications.name: MaxWallet
publications.summary: Small 'one-page' web-app made for a web unit with AngularJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, PassportJS and MongoDB that supports asynchronous account creation, logging in and some CRUD (create, read, update and delete) features once logged in.

publications.name: Ionic App with NodeJS Backend
publications.summary: App made to test quality of user experience when deploying a web app as a native app. NodeJS backend with MongoDB as data store and AngularJS with Ionic Framework components on front end. Currently supports OAuth login through services such as Facebook, account creation etc. as well as native features such as 'toasts'. Live demo can be seen at the above URL with the code and instructions on how to build natively on my Github.
